description:
The leader of Team JNPR.
Despite coming from a long line of Huntsmen, he lacks combat skills. Unlike the other students, he didnâ€™t graduate from a primary combat school. However, he has great potential as a leader and a burgeoning skillset in strategic and situational judgment. Pyrrha recognizes his abilities and helps him grow under her guidance.
His weapon is a family heirloom called Crocea Mors. It is a one-handed sword and a scabbard that transforms into a shield.
Source: Official site
name: Jaune Arc
